review: Chicago Paulies is a hidden gem that delivers an authentic and delightful dining experience. The food, especially the Chicago-style hot dogs and Italian beef sandwiches, is excellently prepared and bursting with flavor. The service is friendly and engaging, with the owner, Paulie, making every visit memorable. Despite the limited seating and parking, the quality and authenticity of the food, along with the welcoming atmosphere, make it a must-visit. Highly recommend for a taste of Chicago in Tampa!
